articles.title: About this site
articles.contents: This site showcases the power and beauty of geospatial data visualization through the use of tools such as R programming and ArcMap 10.8. Its primary goal is to demonstrate how spatial data can be transformed into meaningful insights, supporting better and more informed decision-making in real-world applications.

            BIO
            Conservation professional and data scientist with
            expertise in biodiversity monitoring, geospatial analytics,
            and sustainable tourism practices. Applies data-based
            approaches to support policy development and decision
            making. Committed to advancing effective wildlife management
            in and around protected areas
